title: Start
body:
Oh, hi, Vincent!
[[Hi |#1]]
[[<<Inventory.Has(RecordPlayer)>> Hey, I got the record player |#8]]

Lovely evening, isn't it?
[[It sure is. What are you up to? |#2]]

title: It sure is. What are you up to?

body:
Just enjoying the view, it's really nice here
[[Aren't you excited for the star that has fell? |#3]]

Not quite. I was thinking about it, of course. But I doubt there is anything I need that takes magic to achieve.
[[Nothing at all? |#4]]

I guess. I find happiness mostly in simple things - like beautiful flowers or skies at the dawn. Or music, I really love it!
[[Music? What kind of it? |#5]]
[[That is a little odd, but in a good way |#6]]

Well, I love all sorts of things, I mostly listen to old songs lately. I would certainly love to listen something right now - if there is something that can make this moment better - it's music!
[[I think I heard Fibie and her friends having a party on the meadow. Maybe I can ask them to borrow the record player for a little |#7]]

Is it? Well, I suppose that can be said for both of us - your friendship with Rick is odd as well, and definitely in a good way 
[[I guess. Maybe I can borrow a record player for you? I heard other frogs having a party at the meadow |#7]]
Oh, that would be so kind of you! Thanks anyway!

Wow, thank you so much, i'd really love some music right now! I want to tell you a secret, since you've been so nice to me
[[A secret? |#9]]

I saw the star and I know where it is. It was fell exactly when I was sitting here and watching the skies. The star fell in the water, not far away from where
[[I would never guess to look there. Thank you! |#10]]

Don't mention it! I'm not sure if it's a useful information since we don't have any vessel here, but I'd like you to be the one who'll get the star. You are very nice, both of you
[[Thanks a lot, I'll try to come up with something to swim|#11]]
